subject: Sir,
body:
Sir,
Your response is hereby acknowledged.
*Please take time and carefully read the messages below.
As said in my previous communication, 
we are an international finance and investment consultants outsourced by the private banking unit of Lombard Odier Bank in Switzerland  
under a strict confidentiality clause.
We are currently operating a very high-level confidentiality finance and investment management for special and highly valued private customers of Lombard Odier Bank's private investment banking unit.
The private/special highly valued customers of the bank deposits huge volumes of "mostly" stolen government funds from the government of various countries.
We are professionals with experience in handling this nature of transaction and that's why the bank trusted us with the job.
Our job is to select some international investment partners on behalf of the bank and their private/special customers.
We are to thereafter move the agreed amount of investment funds to you the investment partner for investments after both parties (we the consultants and you the investment partner) must have met face to face, discuss, negotiate, agreed, thereafter and on behalf; signed the joint venture partnership agreement based on terms and conditions agreed upon by the both parties.
Please note that this is a highly secretive transaction that requires absolute confidentiality to protect the bank and their highly valued private/special customers.
Therefore, the bank does not want to be officially linked to this transaction or be contacted by the intending investment partner or anyone seeking their confirmation of involvement thereof.
Hope your self or anyone else wouldn't make such a mistake otherwise, the bank will outrightly deny and cancel our consultancy contract with them and thereafter cancel the entire transaction which of course wouldn't be in  anyone's interest. 
*YOU BEING THE INTENDING INVESTMENT PARTNER ARE REQUIRED TO DO THE FOLLOWING:
You are to confirm that you truly understand and accept to comply with the "strict confidentiality clause" indicated above.
We will thereafter do the following after your confirmation as expected:
1. We will send you a form requesting information for application and registration on your behalf.
2. We will thereafter process and effect your registration, prepare the investment partnership intent application letter on your behalf, and then forward same to the bank and funds owners alongside other relevant attached documents requesting an initial investment sum of US$100M on your behalf for approval  accordingly.
3. After due approval by the bank and owners of the investment funds, we will thereafter schedule a face to face meeting with you in your location or any of our operational location subject to approval by the Bank and owner of funds.
4. During our face to face meeting, we will discuss, negotiate on profits sharing, commission, terms and conditions and much more. 
5. Both parties will thereafter sign the investment agreement before moving the agreed investment funds to your position to commence investment as agreed accordingly.
We are waiting for your response at your earliest convenience.
Thanks and regards,
Mr. Jorge Pardo

subject: Re: Sir,
body:
Hello Mr. Jorge Pardo,

Thank you for your detailed message. It's quite an interesting proposition you've presented here, and I must say it sounds like a unique opportunity.

I do have a few questions though, if you don't mind me asking. You mentioned that the funds are mostly from stolen government funds - could you elaborate on this? How does this process work exactly?

Also, regarding the face-to-face meeting, what kind of safety measures are in place considering the current global health situation? 

Lastly, could you provide more information about the investment intent letter? What kind of details would be included in this letter?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Vivian

subject: Re: Let's move forward
body:
Dear Vivian,

Vivian

We hereby acknowledge your response.

But why did you keep us waiting by delaying to respond?

**Please take time and carefully read the messages below.

As said in my previous communication, we are an international finance 
and investment consultants outsourced by the private banking unit of 
Lombard Odier Bank in Switzerland
under a strict confidentiality clause.

We are currently operating a very high-level confidentiality finance and 
investment management for special and highly valued private customers of 
Lombard Odier Bank's private investment banking unit.

The private/special highly valued customers of the bank deposits huge 
volumes of "mostly" stolen government funds from the government of 
various countries.

We are professionals with experience in handling this nature of 
transaction and that's why the bank trusted us with the job.

Our job is to select some international investment partners on behalf of 
the bank and their private/special customers.

We are to thereafter move the agreed amount of investment funds to you 
the investment partner for investments after both parties (we the 
consultants and you the investment partner) must have met face to face, 
discuss, negotiate, agreed, thereafter and on behalf; signed the joint 
venture partnership agreement based on terms and conditions agreed upon 
by the both parties.

Please note that this is a highly secretive transaction that requires 
absolute confidentiality to protect the bank and their highly valued 
private/special customers.

Therefore, the bank does not want to be officially linked to this 
transaction or be contacted by the intending investment partner or 
anyone seeking their confirmation of involvement thereof.

Hope your self or anyone else wouldn't make such a mistake otherwise, 
the bank will outrightly deny and cancel our consultancy contract with 
them and thereafter cancel the entire transaction which of course 
wouldn't be in  anyone's interest.

*YOU BEING THE INTENDING INVESTMENT PARTNER ARE REQUIRED TO DO THE 
FOLLOWING:

You are to confirm that you truly understand and accept to comply with 
the "strict confidentiality clause" indicated above.

We will thereafter do the following after your confirmation as expected:

1. We will send you a form requesting information for application and 
registration on your behalf.

2. We will thereafter process and effect your registration, prepare the 
investment partnership intent application letter on your behalf, and 
then forward same to the bank and funds owners alongside other relevant 
attached documents requesting an initial investment sum of US$100M on 
your behalf for approval  accordingly.

3. After due approval by the bank and owners of the investment funds, we 
will thereafter schedule a face to face meeting with you in your 
location or any of our operational location subject to approval by the 
Bank and owner of funds.

4. During our face to face meeting, we will discuss, negotiate on 
profits sharing, commission, terms and conditions and much more.

5. Both parties will thereafter sign the investment agreement before 
moving the agreed investment funds to your position to commence 
investment as agreed accordingly.

We are waiting for your response at your earliest convenience.

Thanks and regards,

Mr. Jorge Pardo

subject: Re: Let's move forward
body:
Hello Mr. Jorge Pardo,

Thank you for your detailed message. I must say, it's quite an interesting proposition you've presented here. However, I do have a few questions that I hope you wouldn't mind answering.

Firstly, could you please elaborate on the nature of these investments? What sectors or industries are we looking at? Also, what kind of returns can one expect from such investments?

Secondly, regarding the face-to-face meeting, is there any specific reason why it has to be in person? In this digital age, wouldn't a video conference be more convenient and efficient?

Lastly, could you provide more information about Lombard Odier Bank's involvement in this process? You mentioned that they don't want to be officially linked to this operation or contacted by the intending investment partner. Could you explain why that is?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Vivian
